name: Tiny Gem Hunter
description:
《Tiny Gem Hunter》is an easy and fun puzzle game. The concept which is based on an Arkanoid-type game includes physical collisions with various types of barriers plus different level design offering players strategic thinking and true entertaining gaming experience. The story is about one Dino and one little girl's friendship and the adventure of traveling around the world to find the caves full of gemstones. Dino envy golden dragon's treasure but he don't want to be like golden dragon to attack human village. Therefore, he take little girl's suggestion, he use his own power to collect gemstones.


Key features:
1. Clear and simple objective and fast paced gameplay
2. 7 special islands with over 140 levels
3. Adorable characters and cute stories
4. Social system allow you challenge your friends
5. Superpowers
6. Physics collisions gameplay

※ Language support English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese and Japanese.
